title: T3s FS - PSA-4 Merkle  & PSA-1 Rhoades
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T3s FS - PSA-4 Merkle  & PSA-1 Rhoades
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Craig D
Hi,

I have a few T3s available for sale.  I have a very clean PSA-4 Merkle, which I'd ask $700 for.  I also have a rare, sharp PSA-1 (due to a pinhole) example of Rhoades, which I'd ask $650 for.

Merkle is not an easy T3 and is always in high demand.  Rhoades is simply one of the toughest of all the Turkey Reds.

Thanks in advance and happy collecting!  Craig
